title: JavalongKeyword

metadata.description: Learn about JavalongKeyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
long myNum = 15000000000L;
System.out.println(myNum);

Definition and Usage
The
long
keyword is a data type that can store whole numbers from -9223372036854775808 to 9223372036854775808.
Note that you should end the value with an "L":
Related Pages
Read more about data types in our
Java Data Types Tutorial
.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers JavalongKeyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use JavalongKeyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of JavalongKeyword and how to apply it in your projects.
